de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.statistics

Class DistanceStatisticsWithClasses<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,CollectionResult<double[]>>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.statistics.DistanceStatisticsWithClasses<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>

    @Title(value="Distance Histogram")
@Description(value="Computes a histogram over the distances occurring in the data set.")
public class DistanceStatisticsWithClasses<O>
extends AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,CollectionResult<double[]>>
    Algorithm to gather statistics over the distance distribution in the data set.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
